com.krobothsoftware.commons.network

Class CookieManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.krobothsoftware.commons.network.CookieManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CookieManager
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Stores and sends HTTP Cookies through HttpURLConnection.
    Since:
    SNC 1.0
    See Also:
    CookieList, Serialized Form

      • getCookies

        public static List<Cookie> getCookies(HttpURLConnection connection)
        Gets List of cookies from HttpURLConnection response headers. 
         Header Set-Cookie:
 ...
        Parameters:
        connection - url connection
        Returns:
        cookies built from connection, or empty list
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • setCookies

        public static void setCookies(HttpURLConnection connection,
              List<Cookie> cookies)
        Sets Cookie request header for connection on list of cookies. 
         Header Cookie: [cookies]
        Parameters:
        connection - being set up
        cookies - to set up
        Since:
        SNC 1.0

      • setupCookies

        public static void setupCookies(HttpURLConnection connection,
                CookieMap cookies)
        Sets Cookie request header for connection on map of cookies. Only sets cookies with appropriate domain of connection. 
         Header Cookie: [cookies]
        Parameters:
        connection - being set up
        cookies - to set up
        Since:
        SNC 1.0
